items.title: Is Boston College a real rival for Notre Dame?
items.summary: Welcome to SB Nation Reacts, a survey of fans across the NCAA. Throughout the year we ask questions of the most plugged-in Notre Dame fans and fans across the country. items.title: When, where, and how to watch Notre Dame VS Boston College
items.summary: After a bye week, Notre Dame is back in action on the gridiron this week against the Boston College Eagles. The Irish are looking for its 2nd consecutive invitation to the college football playoff, while BC is looking for its second win of the season. Notre Dame is ranked #12 in the AP Poll, but […]

items.title: Notre Dame VS Boston College: Weather Report
items.summary: The Notre Dame Fighting Irish are finally back in action on Saturday as they travel to Chestnut Hill to take on the Boston College Eagles. Saturday will be the first day of November which is All Saints Day, so it’s quite fitting that the these two Catholic Schools play a college football game. November also […]

items.title: Marcus Freeman said the “struggle is there for a reason”
items.summary: Notre Dame is prepping to travel to New England to take on the Boston College Eagles in game eight of the Fighting Irish football season. Notre Dame has this one game to make a loud example of itself before the initial college football rankings come out. So — hearing Marcus Freeman talk about struggling raises […]

items.title: Marcus Freeman is going to be a HOT name for a new job this coaching cycle
items.summary: College football is on fire right now. It’s more like a double fire though. The season itself has been outstanding with plenty of storylines all around and there are still over 30 schools that still have a fair chance at making the college football playoff. The HOTTEST thing about college football, however, isn’t the play […]

items.title: OPENING ODDS: Notre Dame is a MASSIVE road favorite over Boston College
items.summary: Notre Dame is coming off of a bye weekand is currently ranked #12 in the country with a 5-2 record. items.title: How Notre Dame’s opponents fared in week 9 of the college football season
items.summary: Notre Dame got off to a rough start in 2025, but they looked like they fixed a few things in a 56-30 win over the Purdue Boilermakers and then the 56-13 win on the road against the Arkansas Razorbacks. They followed those two victories with two victories which covered massive spreads in a 28-7 win […]

items.title: Notre Dame’s “rankings journey” hits a wall after the bye week
items.summary: The Notre Dame football team sat back this past Saturday and ate their cheeseburgers during their final bye week of the season. In a weekend of mostly “meh” matchups, the final results once the clock went sero were also mostly “meh” as well. Don’t get me wrong — I found Saturday to be highly entertaining, […]
